interpretation:
The merperson emoji represents a mythical creature with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a fish. This card can symbolize a sense of duality or being torn between two worlds. It suggests a need for balance and integration of different aspects of oneself. The merperson can also represent the power of intuition and the ability to navigate through the depths of emotions. 

When this card appears in a reading, it may be urging you to listen to your inner voice and trust your instincts. It can also indicate a need to reconcile conflicting parts of yourself or to find a way to harmonize opposing forces in your life. The merperson encourages you to explore the depths of your emotions and to embrace your inner wisdom.
